entries.name: correct_for_windows_path(path)
entries.desc: Corrects path (usually returned by `URI.parse().path` on Windows), that comes with a leading slash.

entries.name: glob_files_in_dir(glob, base_path)
entries.desc: Globs for files matching pattern inside of directory, returning absolute paths to the matching files.

entries.name: popen(*command)
entries.desc: This calls IO.popen and reads the result

entries.name: silent_system(*command)
entries.desc: Invokes system, but silences all output.
